reviews.review: One of the best games ive ever played
good game, I always find myself playing this game after a while with friends
MUITO BOM, ESTOU COM MAIS DE 100000000 DE HORAS JOGADAS E 5 ANOS DE JOGO COMPRADO NA STEAM E SÓ ESTOU COMENTANDO AGORA.

GOOD
/ɡʊd/

"Definition"

Adjective

1. To be desired or approved of.
"it's good that he's aiming for the head"

2. Having the required qualities; of a high standard.
"a good game"

synonyms:	fine, of high quality, of a high standard, quality, superior; 

Noun

that which is morally right; righteousness.
"a mysterious balance of good and silver rank"

synonyms:	virtue, righteousness, virtuousness, goodness, morality, ethicalness, uprightness, upstandingness, integrity, principle, dignity, rectitude, rightness; 

benefit or advantage to someone or something.
"he convinces his father to purchase this good game"

synonyms:	benefit, advantage, profit, gain, interest, welfare, well-being, enjoyment, satisfaction, comfort, ease, convenience;

adverbINFORMAL

1. well.
"Silvers could never play this good"

Игра просто мусор, предлагаю потратить свое время на что-нибуть реально годное, а не на эту парашу !

От этой игры постоянно испытываешь разного рода эмоции, начало всегда очень непредсказуемое, но как катка достигает своего пика, там и начинается атомная война пукана! В целом игра неплохая за исключение читаков :D
